title: Mixed martial arts
summary: Mixed martial arts (MMA), sometimes referred to as cage fighting,[1] no holds barred (NHB),[2] and ultimate fighting,[3] is a full-contact combat sport based on striking, grappling and ground fighting, incorporating techniques from various combat sports including boxing, kickboxing and martial arts from around the world.[4] The first documented use of the term mixed martial arts was in a review of UFC 1 by television critic Howard Rosenberg in 1993.[5] The question of who actually coined the term is subject to debate.[6]
